chunk:
Aveeno Calm + Restore Age Renewal Anti-Wrinkle Under Eye Gel

Brand: Aveeno

Category: Around Eye Cream
book: 1990-Aveeno Calm + Restore Age Renewal Anti-Wrinkle Under Eye Gel

chunk: Ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Dimethicone, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Flour, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Extract, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Caprylyl Glycol, Dimethiconol, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Laureth-7, Sodium Polyacrylate, Polyacrylamide, Chlorphenesin, Citric Acid
book: 1990-Aveeno Calm + Restore Age Renewal Anti-Wrinkle Under Eye Gel

chunk: Directions: After cleansing, dab a small amount around the entire eye area, patting gently until the product is absorbed into the skin. Gentle enough for daily use, AM and PM.Questions? 866-428-3366; Outside US, dial collect 215-273-8755 www.aveeno.com
book: 1990-Aveeno Calm + Restore Age Renewal Anti-Wrinkle Under Eye Gel

chunk: Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
